price: Ubangijinku ne Yake gudãnar da jirgi a cikin tẽku, dõmin ku nema daga falalarSa. Lalle ne Shĩ, Yã kasance a gare ku Mai jin ƙai.
arabic: رَّبُّكُمُ ٱلَّذِي يُزۡجِي لَكُمُ ٱلۡفُلۡكَ فِي ٱلۡبَحۡرِ لِتَبۡتَغُواْ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ بِكُمۡ رَحِيمٗا

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: rabbukumu alladhī yuz'jī lakumu al-ful'ka fī al-baḥri litabtaghū min faḍlihi innahu kāna bikum raḥīman
